summary: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.
cast: Alec Guinness|Cecil Parker|Herbert Lom|Peter Sellers|Danny Green|Jack Warner|Katie Johnson|Philip Stainton|Frankie Howerd|Madge Brindley|Hélène Burls|Jimmy Charters|Kenneth Connor|Michael Corcoran|Michael Corcoran|Harold Goodwin|Fred Griffiths|Lucy Griffiths|George Hilsdon|Phoebe Hodgson|Vincent Holman|Arthur Howell|Anthony John|Stratford Johns|Frederick Kelsey|Evelyn Kerry|Sam Kydd|Anthony Lang|George Leech|Aileen Lewis|Edie Martin|Colin McKenzie|Jack Melford|Robert Moore|Arthur Mullard|Paul Phillips|Ewan Roberts|George Roderick|John Rudling|Leonard Sharp|George Spence|Peter Williams|Neil Wilson
title: El quinteto de la muerte
